dict.string: Merge the selected PDF files and move them to trash.
Optimize, encrypt and manipulate PDF files
Enter a resolution in dpi (e.g. 100) or just ↩ for 150 dpi.
Enter the password or just ↩ if not password protected.
Alfred PDF Tools requires additional components to support AES decryption. The installation will take place in the workflow folder and your system will not be affected.
Enter the output filename without extension.
Enter the maximum amount of pages for each PDF file.
Enter the maximum file size in MB for each PDF file.
Enter page numbers and/or page ranges.
Enter page numbers and/or page ranges.
Result will be copied to the clipboard
Text used in the tag appended to the output PDF filenames for Split and Slice file actions.
